entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:15 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 01:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon then southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
